bike.description: Kinesium triple-butted alloy, 12 x 142 rear dropouts, 100mm travel mp4 suspension, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, asymmetrical chainstays, cartridge bearing pivots, Rock Shox Monarch R shock with rebound adjust and 10mm hardware, replaceable derailleur hanger, Formula 12 x 142mm axle

components.description: Rock Shox XC32 TK 29 Solo Air, 15mm axle, lever actuated lockout, air spring compression, rebound adjust, alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
Mavic TN119 disc rims, 32H, Formula sealed bearing hubs, stainless steel spokes
Shimano Deore rear and Alivio 34.9mm dual pull front
Shimano M445 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear RT56 rotors
Ritchey Mountain Riser, 670mm x 20mm rise x 31.8mm
